title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Crisp pancetta in a pan; remove from heat.
Whisk eggs, yolk, and cheese in a bowl.
Toss hot pasta with pancetta and fat, then quickly stir in egg mixture off the heat.
Season generously with pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken tikka simmered in a creamy tomato-based masala sauce.
ingredients: 2 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices 30+ mins.
Grill or pan-sear chicken until charred and cooked.
Sauté onion, garlic, ginger; add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and chicken; simmer 5–8 mins. Adjust salt.
